bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Pathological Condition identical with pian zhui 偏墜 , unilateral drop. Ben cao meng quan 本草蒙筌 Substance Entry gua lou shi 栝 蔞實：仍治偏疝，酒浸微煎，如法服之，住痛如劫 , “To cure hemilateral elevation-illness it is to be soaked in wine and slightly boiled. If ingested according to the pattern, the pain will be eased as if [the entire problem] had been eliminated”. Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Substance Entry gua lou 栝蔞 , gen 根 , the root: 偏疝痛極：劫之立住。 用綿袋包暖陰囊。取天花粉五錢，以醇酒一碗浸之，自卯至午，微煎 滾，露一夜。次早低凳坐定，兩手按膝，飲下即愈，未下再一服 , “In the case of hemilateral elevation-illness with pain reaching an extreme, it brings immediate relief. Take a soft bag and wrap warmly around the testicles. Then take 5 qian of tian hua fen and soak in a bowl with concentrated wine from the hour mao in the morning to the hour wu at noon. Add mild heat and let it stand open, uncovered, overnight. The next morning let [the patient] sit on a bench with his testicles hanging, and have his two hands hold his knees. When he drinks this and [the elevation] comes down, this is the cure. If it fails to descend, ingest once more”.
